name: Blokhed v0.2
description:
P Key to Pause / Edit Keybindings

Arrow Keys for movement

Enter Key for menu select

BackSpace Key for menu return

Hold Left Shift to Run and increase Jump Height

Spacebar to Jump

D Key to Throw Rocks

W Key for Stick Attack

UPDATES!!!!!

  • Added customizable keybindings
  • Added Bird sprites
  • Added Frog enemies that jump
  • Sound Effects for enemies when they are damaged
  • Added a Gameover menu
  • Added Saving  and Loading*

*A file is saved when you complete the first level.  If you select New Game on the start menu it will erase the save file.  I will be adding a confirmation menu in the next update!
